name: AllfredOne
description:
AllfredOne was born with a strange power, he can spawn up to 4 clones of himself, so he can do nothing all his life, always delegating all the job to his clones.

But this power came at a cost (sort of). Every time AllfredOne spawn a clone he gives to him a part of his skills and statistics and can regain them only when re-merge with the clone, but seeing that AllfredOne likes to do nothing is not a big deal for him.

You and your friends play as AllfredOne’s clones, and your work is to accomplish all the tasks AllfredOne will give to you.

Cooperation and collaboration are the key for success, as any task will ask you and your friends to pull from a shared set of resources. Be too greedy and your teammates will not have enough of them to complete their job, be too generous and you will not have enough.

In both cases someone will have to go back and forth asking for stats  losing a lot of time, and time is not on your side because AllfredOne loves taking naps. Every time he falls asleep all the clones will disappear.
